name: Exp10_new_B_gr9_hs_100_labsize_11_eplen251_lstmplastic
cmdLine: export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64 &&  PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/local/nvidia/bin:/opt/hadoop/latest/bin && export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/nvidia/lib64/  &&  export LC_ALL=C.UTF-8  &&   export LANG=C.UTF-8  &&  cd /home/work/ && python3 gridlab.py   --nbiter 1000000 --rule oja --squash 0 --hiddensize 100 --type lstmplastic --lr 1e-4 --eplen 251 --print_every 100 --save_every 1000  --bentropy 0.1 --blossv .03 --randstart 1 --gr .9 --rp 0 --labsize 11 --rngseed {{mesos.instance}}
